channel.title: Although it's been said before:
channel.description:
Following the discussion in the davidudes congratulations topic; why don't we get a notebook and send it too each other to sign? It's been suggested a million times, but I think we could do it this time. I mean, it'd be pretty cool, we send it too each other, write our signature, send it too the next person. MITB could organize the roster, so it's easy and cheap, i.e I send to Lothy, to xXKaneXx etc because they live max an hour from me.
Don't you reckon?

item.title: Although it's been said before:
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Lothy:

Less than a dollar. I’m sure the price increases a lot when sending from Australia to another country though.

Are we talking about a notebook or a piece of paper?

Read full topic

item.title: Although it's been said before:
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

I’ll mail it to JME, he doesn’t live that far away, and I think Legit could mail it to me with out too much cost.
Sounds like a good idea to me, until some jackass steals it and doesn’t send it to anyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Although it's been said before:
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

On another topic

Someone in each country would have to pay more then, but it wouldn’t be much because it wouldn’t go from the USA to Australia. Would it be relatively cheap to send to a close country like the UK to France?

Fuck, I was wrong. Can the notebook be sent in an envelope or does it have to be in a package?

Read full topic

item.title: Although it's been said before:
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:57, topic:200722”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=265336.msg2198507#msg2198507 date=1208622649]

It’s noteable that most of the eliteists are “england fags”:

-Me
-Cowie
-Thug-Life
-Stork
-Mopman
…Many more…

Oh yes I agree wholeheartedly. The only lovable people on this website are Australian.

Anyway, I couldn’t see it working on an international level. At the end of the day, someone is going to have to pay for it to be sent overseas, and if they’re anything like me then they won’t.

How expensive is that to send something there you live.
So long we don’t write it on stoneplates I don’t think will not be so expensive (Not more than 5$).

[/quote]
Less than a dollar. I’m sure the price increases a lot when sending from Australia to another country though.[/quote]
With 5 dollar i mean sending it to any country in the world.
Not only in your own country.
So just stop playing Runescape for a month and you have the money.

Read full topic
